Summary: We were eating a Sonic when we saw it.
divs: sighting detailswe were going shopping and just stoped at a sonic drive-in and that's when we saw the ufo. we were kind of freaked out but we finish up our meal and left to go and report it here. it sort of followed us, it sig-zaged away at a moment, then it came back but right as we crossed back into washington state (spokane county) it fanished. then when we got home our telephone and internet\cable were down until midnight (we were waiting for saturday night live). we felt so scared we actually went to a nearby family member to tell them and see if there internet was down. theres was too.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Post Falls
There were no other sightings in Post Falls on or around May 16th 2009
